name: Daniel Cohen
description: Friends would describe me as a well rounded person who is loyal, trustworthy, competent and is always open to new experiences. I want to be part of a couple that others can look at and say awwww, thats nice, I wish I had that…I am looking for a companion that I can count on as a friend and still be completely happy with and attracted to. I am at a good place in my life and career and just need someone to enjoy life with. Theres a lot of life to live and I want to find someone to live it with me!
